body_html: @yjl9122 Both I'd say, bazel is a build tool not a compiler. I am using mac os and ubuntu, so bazel is either using llvm or gcc regarding the os (I guess). FYI: Debugging with llvm and bazel is not working currently (bazelbuild/bazel#2537).
body_text: @yjl9122 Both I'd say, bazel is a build tool not a compiler. I am using mac os and ubuntu, so bazel is either using llvm or gcc regarding the os (I guess). FYI: Debugging with llvm and bazel is not working currently (bazelbuild/bazel#2537).
body: @yjl9122 Both I'd say, bazel is a build tool not a compiler. I am using mac os and ubuntu, so bazel is either using llvm or gcc regarding the os (I guess). FYI: Debugging with llvm and bazel is not working currently (https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/2537).
